replies.body:
For people who don't remember:

> **Deathfire Grasp**

> 120 AP

> 10% CDR

> Unique Active: Deals 15% of target champion's maximum health in magic damage and applies the debuff, Doom. Doom amplifies all magic damage that champion takes by 20% for 4 seconds. 90 second cooldown (750 range).

I wouldn't even call it close tbh. The isssue with DFG was that active did a massive chunk of damage by itself (15% max HP) on top of a 20% damage amp. The flat magic pen that currently is on abyssal actually amps damage by more than 10% against squishies, but isn't very effective vs tanks. Changing it to a flat 10% is a way of balancing it so its not as oppressive against squishies, while offering more damage against tanky enemies.
